summary: After surviving a near-death experience, Rachel awakens in a mental hospital with five other patients who all claim they are being hunted by Death.
cast: Cherish Lee|J.D. Head|Benjamin Pitts|James C. Burns|Adam Fortin|Jay Wilkins|Serdar Kalsin|Alice Ensor|Brent Fidler|Nick Mathis|Peter Bisson|Rebekah Brandes|Turiya Dawn|Mike Korich|Caia Coley
title: Venganza infernal
